me.Abhigya.core.util.yaml

Class YamlConfigurationComments

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.configuration.MemorySection
      • org.bukkit.configuration.MemoryConfiguration
        • org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration
          • org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration
            • me.Abhigya.core.util.yaml.YamlConfigurationComments
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.configuration.Configuration, org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection

    public class YamlConfigurationComments
extends org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration
    An implementation of Configuration which saves all files in Yaml, and allows to comments the keys by using the method options().comment().

    Note that this implementation is not synchronized.

      • loadConfiguration

        public static YamlConfigurationComments loadConfiguration(java.io.File file)
        Creates a new YamlConfigurationComments, loading from the given file.

        Any errors loading the Configuration will be logged and then ignored. If the specified input is not a valid config, a blank config will be returned.

        The encoding used may follow the system dependent default.

        Parameters:
        file - Input file
        Returns:
        Resulting configuration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if file is null
